page.title: 13CLUBS
page.content: EMLEY HAS MANY VARIED CLUBS CATERING FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES. {ADULTS:} Mother & Toddlers Group; Emley Drama Group (one play a year ) Ladies Keep Fit; Ladies Badminton; Cricket Club; Football Club (In amateur league,flood lit ground); Emley Moor Rugby Club; Emley Footpath Society (aim to keep paths open); School Parent Teacher Assoc'n; Womens Institute; Senior Citizens Assoc'n; Emley Moor Colliery Band; St.Michael's Womens Group. {CHILDREN & YOUTHS} Pre-school playgroup;Youth Club;Cubs & Boy Scouts; Brownies & Girl Guides. {MANY OF THE CLUBS COMBINED ON JULY {18TH TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE ETHIOPIAN {FAMINE FUND.}More than Â£1000.raised. Coffee, lunches & Strawberry cream teas were served.Many activities were organised, lasting all day.
